about_the_game:
Kids Stay Away....well I See, You Stayed. Hahaha



Well enough with the warnings. You know what you are getting yourself into. Meet your sugar mommy Peni, who is home alone with her thoughts and excitment as she fantasize about her boyfriend playing Cock hero with her and defeating her every single time. Her boyfriend has left her in house alone and ran for some errands. Meanwhile Peni prepares her huge enormous dick for next round of cock hero. Explore her home as she uncovers her deep intimate relationship with her boyfriend.

You as player can practice your dick too with Peni. She's a beginner as she unfolds the pleasures of gooning and wonders of her dick. You can give her company as you explore the wonders of your dick.





This game allows to explore a small apartment where the player can roam freely and explore about Peni's past. Meanwhile she need to release her cum so she challenges you. You don't have to cum until she says so.





This game contains five cockhero videos where the player can get aroused. The main character Peni gets naked in different areas of the house to fulfil her perverted desires. The player has the control whether he wants to experience her desires or not. Other than that, the player can fully explore the apartment level where the player could get the glimpse of the main character's past and her intimate relationship with her boyfriend.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains nudity in the form of cutscenes that are related to futanari. Other than that there's no extreme acts of gore or violence. 

Players can access the nudity part at certain levels of the game. The main level is fully explorable with 3rd person and 1st person camera (After update 1.04)

name: CockHero Battle Rookie

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 2200g or Intel core i3 10th Gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 460 or GTX 750ti 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card shall be compatible
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: This game shall be compatible on anything that came after 2019.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,11
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 3600 or Intel Core i5 10400f
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 580 or GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Sound Card shall be compatible
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: These specs are total overkill for the game. These requirements are pretty low as per the today's graphics requirement trends. This game shall run on almost anything that came after 2019.

short_description: Delve into the immersive experience with your sugar mommy Peni, who is waiting for her boyfriend. Meanwhile she practices her huge dick for an upcoming cockhero battle with her boyfriend as he returns. Find out about her relationship as the game progresses into something naughty and horny.
